meanings.definition: A large breed of dog used for hunting wild boars.
meanings.sent1: The boarhounds tracked the scent of the wild boar through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The boarhounds were trained to assist hunters in catching wild boars.
meanings.sent3: The boarhounds wagged their tails excitedly as they prepared to chase the wild boar.
meanings.sent4: The boarhounds were like fearless warriors on the battlefield, hunting down their prey.
meanings.sent5: The image of the boarhounds chasing after the wild boar stayed etched in his memory.

meanings.sent1: We saw a pack of boarhounds running together in the field.
meanings.sent2: The boarhounds were well-trained and obedient to their owners.
meanings.sent3: The boarhounds looked like a group of friends enjoying a day out.
meanings.sent4: The boarhounds stood proudly, a symbol of strength and unity.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the boarhounds gathered around their master was heartwarming.
